website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a cordless phone that can handle the outdoors and a little abuse, Uniden's WXI377 is for you.
cons: bumblebee-style coloring won't match most decors

customer_reviews.title: This phone is great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone because of the waterproof feature. I own a restaurant and this is the only cordless phone that has stood up to tough handling. (ie. wet hands, splattering milkshakes, dropping, etc.) I have had this phone over a year and it still does the job. The range is not really an issue with me, but there is static if I take it to my office in the rear of the building. However, this is not much different than others I have owned. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was that I wish it had an earpiece volumn and the words on some of the keys are wearing off from constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Phone is waterproof as it proclaims. Was dropped into pool and works fine. Any bad thing is sometimes conversations have alot of static, but this can be cleared by scanning for a new channel. Slight inconvienence when having a conversation. Overall a very good product and well worth the investment for a water resistant phone for poolside.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Aversa

customer_reviews.title: A great phone!  Threw it in the hot tub, No problems.
customer_reviews.text: I tested the phone the first day by throwing it into the water. My wife was quite unhappy with that, but I figure test the warranty day one. The phone is quite waterproof, buttons easy to press while wet and in the hot tub, good ringer volume, nice caller ID. Highly recommend for use in your hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We had such high hopes for this product and sadly had to return it. Only 20 feet away from the base unit, the clarity was very, very poor. We've owned many regular cordless phones of varying quality and price-points, yet the least expensive of these were better than this... they just weren't waterproof. It's a great concept if they could just make them work well. Sure wish we could find a good waterproof phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: NurseMom

customer_reviews.title: Weak but waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this phone if you need to cover areas reliably more than 50 feet away. Even closer than that, there are dead spots. The good news is that it's really waterproof and the voice quality and features are great. I set it up in a back bedroom, nearest my hot tub in the yard, and it's perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Weller

customer_reviews.title: Uniden Submersible Cordless Phone
customer_reviews.text: We love the fact that it can be used out by our pool and we don't have to worry about it getting splashed We had to send the first one back, it didn't work, but Amazon was wonderful, issued a call tag for it, and promptly sent the replacement.. The phone is not as clear as we had hoped for, has a slight buzzing noise we can hear while speaking, but perhaps it is our phone line itself, not sure Overall though, am happy with the phone Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shelley G. Stauble

customer_reviews.title: Can you hear me????
customer_reviews.text: I have placed this phone in many different spots in the house but have found that the reception of the handset is to say the least, terrible. The phone replaced another 900Mhz model that did not have any problem regarding static. Hind sight being 20/20 I wish that I had done a bit more research on this produve prior to buying.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Uniden WX1377 900MHz water resistent cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone was missing some screws on the back; however, the seller was very willing to send these to me. Although I have not received them at this time, I am sure they will be sent. Nice looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: Owen L. Bouma

customer_reviews.title: Still works
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few years now. I bought it to have when I was in our hot tub. Doesn't have great range and picks up a little static so keep the base close to where you plan on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Finley

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, average performance.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone to use outdoors poolside, so I wanted the waterproof features. The performance is not what I have grown to expect for a 900mghz cordless however. At 50 feet, the connection is full of static, regardless of if I change the channels or not. I don't think that I have tested the water-proof features yet, but you never know with kids.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a time
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a coupld of years then quit working. I bought a new battery but it still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but poor reception
customer_reviews.text: As the title suggests this phone is terrific aound the pool. It has been completely submerged several times and still works as well as it did the day I got it. That is not, however, a good thing. I find the reception poor - even at a range of 5-15 feet unobstructed. It definately does not compare to the newer phones with better technology. I understand that panasonic has a new waterproof phone. I may give that a try and leave this phone for my kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. breitenstein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they can sell this NEW phone for such a great, low price! Highly recommended and will definitely buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Abbytreasures

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: we love our new phone... it is great around water which we are alot.....we have ruined many phones by dropping them in the water but this one is water proof....
customer_reviews.author: CAROL50

customer_reviews.title: UNIDEN PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the water resistant. Having it near the pool and not have to worry that it falls in is great.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL MCKENNEY

customer_reviews.title: It works great in the hot tub
customer_reviews.text: After losing several cordless phones to the pool and hot tub, I decided on a water-resistant cordless phone. The Uniden WXI377 fit the bill. It works after being submerged in the hot tub and the signal/reception is still great. I recommend this phone around pools or hot tubs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burgard

customer_reviews.title: get what u pay 4
customer_reviews.text: Listed as a refurb. Cost <$30. Dead battery. Had to buy another battery for $10. Caller ID doesn't work. Phone itself rings and works.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool phone
customer_reviews.text: Need a phone by the pool? Waiting for an important call but you are in the shower or tub? This is your answer! Basic feature cordless phone that is totally waterproof! It floats in the pool, when it rings we just pick it up out of the water and answer! the range is not as far as a regular in-house cordledss (about 30' stays very clear) but the waterproof feature is GREAT. The phone is also ruggedized, and drops are no problem on concrete or tile. Perfect phone around water...and not to bad in the house either!
customer_reviews.author: John Falone

customer_reviews.title: Wishful thinking
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this phone a year ago and returned it. The range was poor and it had a buzz in the background. I saw it in the store again and was hoping it was a newer model. Not sure if it is, but it has the same problems. I will return it again. Too bad, I need a phone for the hot tub. UPDATE. I called Uniden about the buzz. They are aware of the problem. 2 options. They will replace with a non waterproof phone or they will try to repair the phone, but said the buzz may come back. They don't have a waterproof replacement. Back to the store it goes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tre

customer_reviews.title: Seems exactly like it was billed to be...
customer_reviews.text: ...I've used it in my hot tub a few times, no problems. I haven't submersed it, but I have no doubt it'd be fine there too. Like others, I would prefer if the thing were 2.4 or 5.8Ghz and digital spread spectrum -- the 900mhz band is really congested. The phone works best less than 20 feet away from the base station, which isn't really hard to arrange. I wouldn't use it as a primary phone, but who wants to use a yellow, rubber phone as their primary anyway? Uniden makes a good product here as long as you need what they are selling...
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your time with this one. I purchased this phone to use by the pool and was disappointed to find I could not get any reception more than 30ft from the base. What is the point of having a "waterproof" phone if it cannot be used outside? Also, when I was able to receive/make calls, the reception quality was very poor. This phone, although a great idea, is now sitting in the closet collecting dust. I wonder if it's dust proof too?
customer_reviews.author: D. FRALEY

customer_reviews.title: Tough phone, with poor sound quality and poor range.
customer_reviews.text: Just got one of these in the hope that it will survive my three kids, they go through phones pretty quick. This seems to be a very rugged phone, so should last a while. Unfortunately the sound quality is poor and the range is just barely able to cover our small house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still looking
customer_reviews.text: I needed a water resistant 900MHz phone to use around the pool.When I saw the Uniden water-resistant WX1377 I orderd it. When I hooked it up it had a loud HUMMMMM in it. I returned it to Amazon with an exchange. The new phone did the same thing. I called the Uniden factoy and learned this phone has a factory grounding deffect. The Uniden folks told me I should return it to the place of purchase and get my money back . I did. I am still looking for a 900MHz phone to use around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it waterproof and floats in the pool, but the teenagers in this house have yet to find a weakness! I recommend this product for any parent tired of replacing the home phone because the kids are more rugged then the phone. If someone spills a soda on it; no problem... leave it outside in the rain; no problem.. drop it in the tub; no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle A. Risley

customer_reviews.title: lousy phone
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly poor quality for a Uniden phone. Volume is very low -- hard to hear caller. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Catladyeve

customer_reviews.title: Not quite water tight!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is okay.. lots of features for an inexpensive phone that is supposed to float. Listening volume is pretty low, though. It does float, and pretty neat... however, after a couple of dunks in the pool, I see water behind the glass (plastic?) of the LCD. It still works okay, but not totally water tight.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Uniden submersible phone
customer_reviews.text: i bought it and i am glad. i read several bad reviews but more good reviews. as was said several times, there is a slight back ground hum. other than that, the phone is perfect. my hand actually enjoys holding the unit!
customer_reviews.author: Hans Wiedreck

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wxi377 but they sent the wxi477 without notifying me. At the time, I could have bought the 477 phone for $40 cheaper than the 377 phone. They did however refund me $20. Use caution when ordering from this co..
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eick

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the pool
customer_reviews.text: I have an inground pool and we spend a lot of time in the summer in the bacyard. We lost several phones because of water damage. This has stoped this problem. In fact I purchased one for my sister-inlaw as well for her hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Augeri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use around the pool. It works great. Threw it into the water and it does exactly as it says. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bullpoint Rick

customer_reviews.title: second time purchase
customer_reviews.text: love this phone so much I bought another one when I wore out the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lankes

customer_reviews.title: Uniden WXI377 900 MHz Water-Resistant Cordless Phone with Caller ID
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Only wish it had a light on the key pad. Great by the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horwat

product_meta.title: Uniden WXI377 900 MHz Water-Resistant Cordless Phone with Caller ID
product_meta.description:
Uniden 900MHz Water-resistant cordless telephone is perfect for use around the water, whether it is by the pool, hot tub, by a lake or next to the shower. It is so durable it will even float. The WIX377 has call waiting and caller ID as well.

AMAZON.COM
Whether you live on a houseboat or just spend a lot of time near the kids' wading pool, a floating, water-resistant phone comes in handy for many families. Uniden's WXI377 includes comfortable rubber handgrips that keeps the phone from sliding, and a 900 MHz analog signal that provides decent range and a reliably clear connection. A handy belt clip allows you to fasten it on and keep it comfortably close when you're waiting for that important call. 

 With subscription to local service, you'll have access to call waiting/caller ID, which includes a 30-station memory with instant display-and-dial. A 10-station phone book and one-touch Rocket Dial provide access to your most frequently-called numbers; a redial button allows you to quickly return to business if home life has interrupted a call. The phone is compatible with most hearing aids and includes a one-year warranty covering parts and service. 

 What's in the Box
Base, cordless handset, belt clip, power cord, phone cord, warranty and setup information
feature_bullets: Floating handset with rubber grips meets JIS7 waterproof specifications
10-station memory dial and One-touch Rocket Dial
French and English menus; belt clip; 1-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
